website_summaries.verdict: This bed canopy provides a classic, clean look for four-poster beds at a cheaper price tag.
pros: Buyers were impressed by how many accessories arrived with this canopy
Simple adjustments allow you to fit the canopy over a full, queen, or king-sized bed
Included hooks allow you to easily hang from ceiling, but is also designed to hang on a four-poster
cons: Does not fit twin beds very well
Some buyers claimed the canopy does not touch the floor as the online picture showed

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: part 1. Moving into my first home i purchased this for my new bedroom and i am beyond pleased!!! it came on time and well packaged, the canopy is light weight and super easy to put up!!! the finished result is so beautiful and i cannot wait to see how it withholds with some lights on it!
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! I can see through it, which I like. I also bought some magnets, as the seems droop down without them. I got some gold ribbon to tie each corner, which I like a lot better than the white strings that came with it.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Cole

customer_reviews.title: Works with all bed sizes & with or without a frame
customer_reviews.text: Perfect canopy for a larger bed. We have a King size bed and previously purchased a round canopy. It was fine to just use as decor to drape the headboard but couldn’t be used to fully cover the bed. This canopy can be used with a metal frame, 4 poster bed or without a frame at all. The bed comes with all the hardware needed to attach it directly to the ceiling.
customer_reviews.author: Hurricane

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE it! I had no idea it was a mosquito net when I got it but it looks so classy and elegant. I constantly get compliments. I put fairy lights behind it and it looks magical. It does fall down easily and has to be very well secured to the ceiling or not tugged on. The mesh can easily rip but it is a mosquito net!
customer_reviews.author: yogagirl802

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Well made and simple to put up. A little larger than expected so be prepared for some overhang if you hanging above a full size bed but otherwise it's a hit with my daughter and my dog obviously.
customer_reviews.author: ardavis08

customer_reviews.title: Not elegant at all
customer_reviews.text: First of all, the measurements listed in product description should say “approximate.” One side is 2” wider than the other so netting is not square. Also, length was listed as 98” and it’s about 92”. Unfortunately, we had already made our frame based on what we thought it would be. So, had to re-do based on actual size. Also, there is minimal overlap so will have to sew three sides to keep bugs out and use clips on last opening. Would return, except we are desperate to keep mosquitoes under control, so will make this work for now.
customer_reviews.author: kat b.

customer_reviews.title: Completely transformed my room.
customer_reviews.text: I recommend this so much! Instant transformation. Romantic, good quality, super easy. I have some LED lights and some paper cranes attached to the top, both are light weight and add to the magic. All the edges are cut clean and the top has some silky seam. It comes with super heavy duty hooks to go into the ceiling and ribbons to tie back. My dog has accidentally jumped on the curtain part a couple of times in the beginning. There has been no damage. She is a small corgi. Pictures does not do it justice!
customer_reviews.author: ShortcakeBun

customer_reviews.title: Not for King size
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight but hangs nicely and the wrinkles fall out quickly. Super thin. Really the only bad thing I have to say about it is that it is not sized for a king bed. It needs to be about 8 inches longer on top to actually fit. I had to get really creative and cut small holes in the netting and use the supplied ties to anchor it to my posts and stretch it like crazy. It’s still about 4 inches off on each end as you can see from the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Kristie W.

customer_reviews.title: Made my canopy bed look elegant
customer_reviews.text: I really loved this and I thought it was worth the money. I’m no longer using it because I moved and couldn’t bring my canopy bed but it was not bad quality. The assembly was hard for me. I am not a patient person and I had to solicit help from my sister to complete it. It look super cute once it was up and added the perfect amount of elegance to my canopy bed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ahh..heaven
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I mounted it over my queen sized bed and now I feel like princess that I am. I put copper wired lights around the posts of my bed and at night they are the perfect combination for a relaxing, romantic ambiance. I would definitely recommend this item if you want to make your bed a cozy little space.
customer_reviews.author: Big Momma

customer_reviews.title: Good for the Price
customer_reviews.text: This product was decent enough for the price. I was looking for something more fluffy (This was for my daughter's room) but the more expensive ones on here didn't have as good reviews so I went with this one. My only complaint would be that if you are using it as we did (over the bed v. hanging it from the ceiling) it has the flaps sticking out where it can be hung. I suppose you can cut them off but then it might look worse so we just left them.
customer_reviews.author: Katie O

customer_reviews.title: Be careful of the size and openings
customer_reviews.text: It’s very light and airy. But be aware, it has 8 openings, not 3, not 4, which means it is designed for decoration, not for mosquitoes. I have a four poles bed, difficult to put, size didn’t fix very well. I had to use dozen of clips to close the sides, just kept 3 openings. It doesn’t look very good, but I am tired of returning it, so just kept it.
customer_reviews.author: Neruda

customer_reviews.title: They don’t fit as well as I would have liked
customer_reviews.text: They were definitely worth the money, but they are not really adjustable in anyway. I understand they fit a variety of sizes, but they look a little bit silly. I have a queen size bed for my daughter and these fit up to a king size. Maybe I didn’t put them up right, But they don’t seem to look all that great LOL. It may just be that I don’t know what I was supposed to do to make them fit. Also, they do tear very easily
customer_reviews.author: Derrick

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a little big but I had to make it do what it do. It still looks okay and for the price it’s even better! If you actually have a canopy bed it’s kind of hard to place it right where it needs to be because there are no holes so I cut and made me some holes myself. Another thing is it is very see through and light which is kind of a good thing when I’m watching tv.
customer_reviews.author: Ka'Desha D.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fit quite right but I like it
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice canopy but for a queen size it has a fit that’s a little too big. With the seam the way it is at the top it doesn’t align with the top of bed, giving a little sloppy appearance. You also have to work with it to make it look nice around the corners. I am pleased with it but the fit could be better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Item was Used and Covered in Dead Bugs?!
customer_reviews.text: Despite purchasing a new product, my item came in a opened bag that had been retaped with scotch tape. It was rumpled and clearly used. After hanging the canopy, I was horrified to discover three dead bugs caught in the netting. I reported the incident to Amazon and they are investigating the seller-but please proceed with caution when purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Not bad.
customer_reviews.text: Not what I had imagined. I took a chance on the curtain even though i figured it wouldn’t be what i wanted. The curtain itself was totally fine, just not what i wanted. It was very mesh like and I was wanting more of a sheer curtain vibe. I ultimately couldn’t find that anywhere that wasn’t super expensive so I made my own with cheap shear curtains from Ikea and some durable wire. Looks exactly how I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Camille P.

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought white net for my white canopy bed ,looks very pretty and gives my room a romantic look. Very easy to install but its not very thick material. but good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice canopy. It’s better for canopy beds with bulbs. I have a modern box style canopy. Doesn’t install ass easy as it would on a bed with bulbs
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Went on easy works and looks great my wife loves it
customer_reviews.text: This canopy fit on my home made 2x4 canopy bed, with a little room left for a bigger bed. Went on easy works and looks great my wife loves it, she all ways wanted a canopy bed. The tie backs were to short so had get different ones L also bought the lace trimmed elastic bed wrap bed skirt for the top it only covers 3 sides but that's fine, added a great look to the canopy. Very pleased with the canopy Thank You.
customer_reviews.author: john labelle

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product @ a reasonable price!
customer_reviews.text: EXACTLY what I needed! Protects us from flying insects during the summer in the high desert and makes our bedroom look beautiful! Fits our King size canopy bed frame perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Janis W

customer_reviews.title: Lovely, quality canopy
customer_reviews.text: This canopy is sturdy, well-crafted, and beautiful. It is hung easily with the included hooks and stays very well, providing ample coverage and a beautiful look. I've purchased similar canopies with a less beautiful sheen for much higher prices in the past. This is a beautiful addition to any bedroom and is priced as a steal.
customer_reviews.author: Andi

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is a great look in my bedroom. I hung it by myself. Pretty easy. It's really big, so you will need to use the hooks that are supplied. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: kk48

customer_reviews.title: I’m the queen
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Bought it to hang over my bed. I may be in my 20’s but I can still be a damn princess. 10/10 chance your friends will be jealous. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Cami

customer_reviews.title: Looks beautiful
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this and such a great deal. I would not have been able to buy fabric and make it for this low price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: The product was what I needed. The quality seems great for the price. The only thing was I didn’t realize there was a right way and a wrong way so directions would’ve been a great asset. I had it all set up and realized it was wrong side out and I needed to fix it. Thank you for quality product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen L. Burdick

customer_reviews.title: Not a good choice.
customer_reviews.text: I ended up trashing this because it is not constructed well and constantly falls off the bed posts.
customer_reviews.author: sandra hendricks

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous finishing touch
customer_reviews.text: These bed curtains were exactly what we had hoped to get: nice fabric, great fit on the frame of our daughter's beautiful Restoration Hardware queen-size bed. Even with the bed's unusual canopy frame shape, these curtains were easy to adjust to fit by wrapping and tying. We added some twinkle lights, and voila! Perfection!
customer_reviews.author: David Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful keeps bugs out
customer_reviews.text: It's beautiful. We are using it as a patio canopy and so far it has with stood rain and wind.
customer_reviews.author: M. Elsey

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't call this "elegant". More like something you'd put over a tent than a bed.
customer_reviews.author: The Ogburns

customer_reviews.title: I loved it. Glad that I purchased it
customer_reviews.text: Put this in our tent when we went camping. I loved it. Glad that I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great item, just use your own anchors
customer_reviews.text: This transformed my daughters room completely! She has a four poster bed, and has been begging for a canopy, this seemed the best option, I didn’t want to spend a lot. My main complains that the anchors that come with it, are tiny & useless so if you want it hung properly you’ll need to use better anchors like we did. Overall excellent purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly J Byrne

customer_reviews.title: Meh....
customer_reviews.text: Way too big for a queen size canopy. I was wondering how it could possibly fit so many sizes and the answer is easy...it doesn't. Very disappointing. They should make different sizes that actually fit each canopy bed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cozy vibes
customer_reviews.text: Cheapest way to add romance and a cozy getaway feel. Guests and friends love seeing my master bedroom because it just gives off that cozy feeling. Literally used thumbtacks to install. Have 3 cats, 2 German shepherds and a toddler. They never have pulled them out even with tugging and pulling on it. Held up really well! Highly recommend:)
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: I feel like a princess
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful. Looks nice and airy and almost feels like you don't have anything hanging over you over your bed but still looks gorgeous.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No instructions
customer_reviews.text: No instructions. Can't hook it to ceiling because I live in an apartment and not allowed but I bought it because I have a canopy bed and I'm at a loss in how to put this on
customer_reviews.author: Canberry

customer_reviews.title: Fairytale vibes
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and elegant! Makes you feel like your room is a fairytale
customer_reviews.author: tori wise

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: Very cute! Easy to put up and they look great.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Espinoza

customer_reviews.title: It does work to keep mosquitoes out.
customer_reviews.text: Good luck on ever folding it and getting it put back in the bag it came in. Otherwise it's pretty nice little mosquito netting that overlaps and creates a nice canopy
customer_reviews.author: Hartz D. Hartzell

customer_reviews.title: buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: Apparently there was a long tear in one of the panels and someone used very large stitches to close it up. Not cool.
customer_reviews.author: kim

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size and drape for a 4 poster king bed, and at a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Hickey

customer_reviews.title: Pretty long, need tall rooms so doesnt touch floor.
customer_reviews.text: At first glance it looks sloppy and a mess, like a giant spiderweb deconstructed. Once you lift the corners up and hang them it makes sense and closes up like a net almost, great to somewhat keep bugs out or to look girly. Its a little long so best to have tall rooms for it
customer_reviews.author: Manny

customer_reviews.title: Fit was disappointing
customer_reviews.text: VERY DISAPPOINTED! The fit was next to impossible for a full size bed. Way to big! Not sure I'm going to keep it up as it doesn't look nearly like what was pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks fine but different from image
customer_reviews.text: The net doesn’t have anything in the ceiling when installed. Its open top. How can this be a mosquito net is what I am wondering. I could be wrong but it does seem like it should have net on the ceiling as per the image.
customer_reviews.author: Anshu

customer_reviews.title: Very beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Extremely easy to put up and it’s a beautiful add on to my room. I would buy this again, the only thing that I have a full size bed and it’s really for a queen/king so I had to put an extra nail to hold it up but it still came out very beautiful
customer_reviews.author: Saniah Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Easy to hang and soft net drapes nicely
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly lovely and very practical for northern Michigan's mosquito rich summers! Easy to hang and soft net drapes nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Ponama

customer_reviews.title: Pass
customer_reviews.text: Pain in the butt, not really how I thought it would turn out. It arrived quickly and well packaged but I wouldn't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: HFC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This was so easy to assemble and it looks so good in a room, it totally transformed my bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Not full length, but overall worth buying!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install, light weight. Only dislike is that it doesn’t come all the way down to the floor, but to the top of my bed from the ceiling. The look is aesthetically pleasing and I feel like a kid again with it Over my bed in the best way :)
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t put it up yet but this is the product. It’s very white and very clean
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: small holes
customer_reviews.text: This is really large and the holes per inch or cm are really small. It can impede gnats.
customer_reviews.author: The Void

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: She wanted a princess themed bed and this helped us accomplish that without buying the actual canopy bed!
customer_reviews.author: Happy customer

customer_reviews.title: it rips pretty easy
customer_reviews.text: while I loved this netting on my new bed. it sadly ripped shortly after putting it on my bed thanks to my children pulling on it once. all in all decent quality but I'll need something that wont rip after one tug.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Cook

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product!
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for my daughter. Came in perfect condition and was easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Lovely product
customer_reviews.text: Great product, great value for money. Makes me bed look very regal and classy!
customer_reviews.author: Emma Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful piece that changed the feeling of the room completely. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Bush

customer_reviews.title: tears easily
customer_reviews.text: the mesh is very flimsy. We found 2-3 small tears in it after hanging. Even with the most careful of handling it would not take long before it is ruined
customer_reviews.author: whodat50

customer_reviews.title: Nice touch
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this. It’sa great added touch to her canopy bed. It’s a little big for a full size bed but it just adds to the dramatic feel of the room.
customer_reviews.author: O abby

customer_reviews.title: Looks exactly like the picture
customer_reviews.text: Looks exactly like the picture, adds the aesthetic to the room that I wanted and will outlast a cats claws. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: shar

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Quite pleased. Nicely made. 6 hang points but only 4 hooks supplied
customer_reviews.author: Karl E. O. Fraser

customer_reviews.title: Huge
customer_reviews.text: It is TOO BIG for my full size bed frame. I had to get heavy duty magnets to make it look normal.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this canopy topper. It was easy to put up. Kinda big but still looks really nice. I put mine on the frame. I didn’t hook it to the ceiling. But it still looks great. I love it
customer_reviews.author: Towanna

customer_reviews.title: Flowly material
customer_reviews.text: Just what we were looking for. We used it in our craft tent. Material flows great in the breeze
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Norris

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that this net covers the entire bed fully and keep those mosquitoes out.
customer_reviews.author: Tosshema Lanns

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: My 18 yr old hung this around the ceiling going all around her bed. She loves it
customer_reviews.author: Susan M. Jones

customer_reviews.title: The canopy looks just like the pictures
customer_reviews.text: The canopy looks just like the pictures. I love that the hooks and tie backs are included. It was very easy to install myself and the canopy has not torn!
customer_reviews.author: Maresa S.

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great & Does its Job
customer_reviews.text: I was a little hesitant purchasing this item, but after receiving it it I was very pleased. Ordered the white color & it adds a great appeal to the room, plus does its job preventing mosquitoes out.
customer_reviews.author: Rhemy J

customer_reviews.title: beautiful product
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved this item probably the best room decor purchase I’ve made under $20! Super easy to install with twist in hooks. And Great mesh material.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Don't hesitate
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a canopy for my cal king bed. This was perfect easy to install and fast shipping. I am so happy with my product will definitely buy again. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lesky19

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size over a queen or king bed. Anything smaller would be baggy.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Is crazy romantic and pretty. Used a staple gun to just staple to the celing. Looks exactly how I hoped!
customer_reviews.author: Evie

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: Bigger than expected had to do a few alterations but keep in mind this canopy is supposed to be anchored from the ceiling. Couldn’t because of the ceiling fan 5 star though!
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Holton

customer_reviews.title: A lot nicer than I thought
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter’s room she loves it. She has a full size bed and this is pretty large so we pulled the middle to drape down. Worked perfectly for her Paris theme.
customer_reviews.author: LaTisha H.

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: my girls love this canopy and it really brought the room decor together but beware it can snag like any normal netting
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Loving it!
customer_reviews.text: I like it. It's a little too big but other than that no complaints. Everything else pictured also came fomrom Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Sent back because it was really cheap looking. You get what you pay for tho.
customer_reviews.author: Alecandria Poindexter

customer_reviews.title: I do like this canopy a lot
customer_reviews.text: I do like this canopy a lot, it have on my canopy bed frame, however, the one thing I don't care for is, if you don't hang it from the ceiling, than you see the big white strip of actual fabric on the mesh net, and since I don't need to hang mine, it looks kind of silly.
customer_reviews.author: Keely A.

customer_reviews.title: Full size curtains are bigger than the bed/bedframe
customer_reviews.text: Very simple self explanatory product, if you have a full size bed/bedframe the curtains will be larger than the bed/bedframe.
customer_reviews.author: Latavia Knox

customer_reviews.title: It's like the designer of the net has no idea how ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product to be a functional mosquito net, not for decoration. Unfortunately, it's open in eight (8) places, in all the corners as well as the "middle." The netting is not at all overlapping in the corners so it won't even work as a mosquito net, in fact there is about a 1-2 inch gap in the corners. It's like the designer of the net has no idea how mosquito nets are supposed to work. At least I could return it. If you're looking for a pretty decoration for your bed, this might work. For those who want protection from mosquitoes, look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty, but...
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't fit my daughter's full size bed correctly, but I imagine it would be fine on a queen size bed.
customer_reviews.author: Kali A

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: So easy to assemble! Very elegant looking. Beautiful touch to my room & bed
customer_reviews.author: Nicole A McCloskey

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I git these lights for the bedroom and it was the last thing that really just brought it out the rest of the room so nicely. Would Definitely recommend for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Loved this! It fit perfectly over my 11 year ...
customer_reviews.text: Loved this! It fit perfectly over my 11 year old daughters full size bed. There was just enough room on both sides of her bed to clear her comforter. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Erika Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: This came quick to my house and in great packaging. I have not set up yet but it does have simple directions with it and feels very soft.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Better for a queen or king
customer_reviews.text: A little over sized for a full sized bed but it does still look great
customer_reviews.author: Ashontis Keys

customer_reviews.title: the fit was perfect
customer_reviews.text: perfect fit, i paid more for one at Bed Bath and Beyond and this one was way nicer, i am ordering another one just to have on hand
customer_reviews.author: cindi stackhouse

customer_reviews.title: oooo
customer_reviews.text: amazing. ordered on friday and it came sunday when it was supposed to come thursday. great product and no rips or tears
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good, does what it’s meant to
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice, was super easy to install and came with everything I needed to put it up.
customer_reviews.author: liv

customer_reviews.title: Mosquito net
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these for my neighbors in Puerto Rico, right after hurricane Maria. He told me they really liked them. However, it took about a month for them to get them.
customer_reviews.author: Geo Gotay

customer_reviews.title: Very elegant, cozy
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install. Gives your room an elegant, cozy feel.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Brewer

customer_reviews.title: Baby Shower Decoration
customer_reviews.text: Good product, it worked out well for the baby shower. Easy to put up and everyone wanted it.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Williams

customer_reviews.title: Content
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected, easy to put up . Happy with my canopy.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Concepcion

customer_reviews.title: Receive product with a rip
customer_reviews.text: This product has a rip not a small one a big one . Not happy at all
customer_reviews.author: Nylah

customer_reviews.title: you get exactly what you see
customer_reviews.text: very cool atmosphere in a kids bedroom. good sub instead of a poster bed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It charged me $14 dollars on top of the $20 it was while it already said that shipping was free
customer_reviews.text: It’s good but it charged me 14 dollars more after the 20 I spent and said shipping was free so that’s was rude
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect, I love it, it came out really pretty
customer_reviews.author: Pedro

customer_reviews.title: Big, but works.
customer_reviews.text: Love the canopy. It's a tad to big but I made it work. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Lavender

customer_reviews.title: It’s lovely!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Makes the room feel so cozy and beautiful. You need a big space to lay it out first but after that, super easy to put up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kinda big
customer_reviews.text: It was a little too big for my queen bed. I made it work though!
customer_reviews.author: Taylar

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful n very happy with item. Will b ordering again n a few days. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Mary

product_meta.title: Just Relax Four Corner Post Elegant Mosquito Net Bed Canopy Set, White, Full/Queen/King, 86.6x78.7x98.4 Inches
feature_bullets: ✔ BEAUTIFULLY DESIGNED bed canopy will enhance your bedroom and homes décor by providing a draped canopy over your bed. You can turn your home and bedroom into the palace you’ve always dreamed of with the Just Relax Four Post Bed Canopy Set.

✔ SUPER EASY INSTALLATION with 2 WAYS TO SET UP: You can install the canopy easily into the ceiling with the provided four hooks and wall plugs OR hang it from the corners of your four-post bed for an added touch of style and elegance.
